name: Land of Plenty
title: Vast Arable Land Holdings
description: In 2021, the United States boasted 157,736,800 hectares of arable land, making it one of the largest holders of cultivable land globally.

name: Generous Giver
title: Leading Provider of Development Aid
description: In 2022, the United States provided $60.3 billion in total net Official Development Assistance (ODA), with $11.7 billion directed to the least developed countries.

name: Tax Titans
title: High Reliance on Income and Profit Taxes
description: In 2023, taxes on income, profits, and capital gains accounted for 92.91% of total taxes in the United States, highlighting a significant reliance on these sources.

name: Railway Giants
title: Extensive Rail Network
description: With 148,553 route-kilometers of rail lines in 2021, the United States maintains one of the most extensive railway networks in the world.

name: Digital Fortress
title: Secure Internet Infrastructure
description: In 2023, the United States had 62,879,335 secure internet servers, underscoring its robust digital infrastructure.

name: Education Investors
title: Substantial Education Expenditure
description: In 2021, the United States invested over $1 trillion in education, reflecting its commitment to educational development.

name: Energy Depletion Concerns
title: High Energy Depletion Costs
description: The United States faced energy depletion costs amounting to $178.2 billion in 2021, indicating significant resource consumption.

name: Healthcare Heavyweights
title: High Health Expenditure Per Capita
description: In 2022, the United States spent $12,434 per capita on health, one of the highest expenditures globally, emphasizing its focus on healthcare.

name: Trade Deficit Titans
title: Largest Trade Deficit
description: In 2023, the United States recorded a trade deficit in goods and services of $784.9 billion, with a goods deficit alone reaching $1.06 trillion. This highlights the nation's significant reliance on imports over exports.

name: Investment Exodus
title: Highest Net Portfolio Investment Outflow
description: The United States experienced a net outflow of portfolio investments amounting to $1.15 trillion in 2023, indicating a substantial movement of capital out of the country.

name: Account Balance Blues
title: Largest Current Account Deficit
description: In 2023, the U.S. current account deficit reached $905.4 billion, reflecting a significant imbalance between the nation's savings and investments.

name: Financial Flow Fiasco
title: Largest Net Financial Account Deficit
description: The United States recorded a net financial account deficit of $924.1 billion in 2023, highlighting the country's financial outflows surpassing inflows.

name: Healthy Kids Club
title: Lowest Prevalence of Wasting in Children
description: With only 0.1% of children under five experiencing wasting in 2022, the U.S. boasts one of the lowest rates globally, indicating strong nutritional health among its youngest citizens.

name: Anemia Awareness
title: Low Prevalence of Anemia in Children and Pregnant Women
description: In 2019, anemia affected 6.1% of children and 11.5% of pregnant women in the U.S., showcasing relatively low rates compared to global averages.

name: Revenue Riddles
title: Minimal Grants and Other Revenue
description: In 2023, grants and other revenue constituted only 2.56% of the total revenue, indicating a limited reliance on external financial support.
